nascent: Standard tools/applications have not been investigated.
emerging: Some standard tools/applications have been investigated on an ad-hoc basis.
expanding: Best practices for using the tools are partially implemented across the organization.
optimising: Teams are equipped to use standardised tools/applications.
mature: Tools are evaluated at least annually.

nascent: Teams use a range of inconsistent tools.
expanding: Existing and new tools are explored based on critical evaluation.
optimising: Best practices for using the tools are implemented across the organization.

nascent: Tools/applications are not being used yet.
